law.catch_line: Record of warrants in system of accounts -- Notice of issuance of checks.
law.text: The Finance and Administration Cabinet shall record all warrants in the unified and integrated system of accounts. After the Treasurer has issued a check to pay the warrant, the Treasurer shall notify the Finance and Administration Cabinet; a single notification may reflect all warrants paid each day.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 8. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 146, 1992b-53.
